statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
CRB has $N$ different candies. He is going to eat $K$ candies.
He wonders how many combinations he can select.
Can you answer his question for all $K$(0 �� $K$ �� $N$)?
CRB is too hungry to check all of your answers one by one, so he only asks least common multiple(LCM) of all answers.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
There are multiple test cases. The first line of input contains an integer $T$, indicating the number of test cases. For each test case there is one line containing a single integer $N$.
1 �� $T$ �� 300
1 �� $N$ �� $10^{6}$

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, output a single integer �C LCM modulo 1000000007($10^{9}+7$).
